info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 4:30PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Isolated thunderstorms with strong wind gusts and brief heavy showers will impact portions of east central Broadwater, southeastern Meagher, eastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and Gallatin Counties through 500 PM MST... At 428 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking isolated thunderstorms with brief heavy rain and snow showers and strong wind gusts along a line extending from 20 miles southeast of White Sulphur Springs to 6 miles south of Ennis to 16 miles southwest of Lima. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds with periods of snow could reduce visibility to less than one mile at times. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Manhattan, Ennis, Lima, Monida, Dell, Big Sky, Bannack Pass, Targhee Pass, Cameron, Snowline, Maudlow, Red Rock Pass, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Jeffers, Madison Buffalo Jump State Park, Norris and Mcallister. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
